data.name: Goddess Of Card War 2 DLC-1
data.detailed_description:
A new card character can be purchased in the shop: Yulou
Skill: Cool Down
Deals 1.75 times the damage to all enemies and reduces the rage of all enemies by 5.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
